name: Aloe and Jojoba Cream
description: A&J Cream: Rich in moisture, gentle, and quickly absorbed this organically preserved cream provides a lighter moisturizer than the lotion bar. Perfect for the face, and wonderful for the whole body. This cream is made and preserved with organic ingredients, no parabens or synthetics.

name: Baby (and Adult) Products
description:
Baby skin needs to be treated gently, as does adult skin. 

The cleansing Milk and Honey bath does not dry your skin, but moisturizes with milk, honey and soothing oatmeal. Safe for infant baths; use on skin and in hair. No rinsing needed. Made from food ingredients, so it safe for little children who like to drink their bath water.

The Baby Butt Spray starter kit will convince you that you don’t need to buy pre-made baby wipes. This cleansing spray does not sting like regular wipes, even with diaper rash. Works especially well in the delicate folds of skin, and when fighting sticky-poo. And you save money by washing and reusing the washcloths. The concentrate will refill the spray bottle three times.  The 8 oz refill concentrate is enough to refill the spray bottle 6-8 times depending on your preference.

for more information visit www.ASimpleBody.com

options.name: Baby Butt Spray 8 oz refill concentrate
Baby Butt Spray 4 oz spray bottle (no refill or washcloths)

name: Simple Balm
description:
Olive oil is one of the best moisturizers for your skin. It soaks in quickly and lasts. The beeswax provides a protective barrier that seals in the moisturizer. Vitamin E oil is both healing to the skin, and a natural preservative for the balm. Choose from scented with essential oils of lavender and grapefruit, or unscented with a hit of honey scent from the beeswax.

I’m sure you’ll love this lip balm. It will heal your dry lips, and provide long lasting protection to keep them soft for hours.  

For pick-up orders, just email me.

for more information visit www.ASimpleBody.com

name: Bless Lotion Bar with tin
description:
This waterless lotion is just what dry skin needs. Olive oil, shea butter, and deodorized cocoa butter are all super moisturizing.  The beeswax provides a protective barrier, and the vitamin E oil aids healing as is a natural preservative.  You’ll find that this lotion will soak into your skin, making it feel instantly softer and protected. Later, when you wash your hands you won’t get that slimy feeling that comes from lotion that just sits on the surface of your skin.  

Use this lotion on all areas of your body, even on a dry scalp. Works wonderfully for all skin types, but is especially helpful for eczema and psoriasis when used regularly.   

1/2 oz bar lasts an extremely long time.
for more information visit www.ASimpleBody.com

name: Simple Face and Body Wash
description:
Are you ready to try something that will truly be different from anything you’ve tried before? We've been told that oil is bad for our skin, but it’s not. OIL IS GOOD! Our skin makes it’s own oil to protect it from loosing moisture. So why do we strip that oil off with soap?  

Simple Face and Body wash gently loosens the dirt, because oil dissolves oil. A warm wash cloth opens your pores, and your skin is clean, refreshed, and retains that protective oil. Visit us on Facebook for complete instructions: https://www.facebook.com/asimplebody

for more information visit www.ASimpleBody.com
